prompts: Deploy a Cloud Run service using source code at a specified path.
Deploy a Cloud Run service using an existing container image (e.g., gcr.io/project/image:tag).
List all Cloud Run services in the current project, including names, URLs, and latest revisions.
Get full details of a specific Cloud Run service, including env vars, revisions, and traffic settings.
Fetch logs for a specific Cloud Run service, filtered by severity, revision, or timeframe.
List all available Google Cloud projects accessible to the current credentials.
Create a new Google Cloud project with a specified project ID and project name.
